name: Vrock
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Talons: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Spores (Recharge 6): A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 5 (1d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.
actions.Stunning Screech (1/Day): The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the vrock's next turn.
